description.en: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.ar: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.br: Aumenta a taxa de ganho de Experiência para o Grupo em 50%, nega as limitações de distância das habilidades de grupo e permite acumulá-las, combinando sua duração, mas não os efeitos. Seu grupo recebe o dobro de pontos quando alcança um novo nível. Deve ser ativado pelo líder do grupo. (Dura 15 dias a partir da ativação, mesmo quando desconectado)
description.cns: 增加剧团经验获得率50%并增强剧团技能，不受距离限制。允许剧团技能叠加、组合提高它们持续时间，但不影响其效果。当你的剧团达到新的等级将会获得双倍点数。当团长激活它时有效。(激活后持续15天，离线计时)
description.de: Erhöht die Rate, mit der Gruppen EXP gewonnen wird, um 50% und verbessert die Gruppenfertigkeiten, indem es ihre Entfernungsbeschränkungen aufhebt. Erlaubt das Stapeln von Gruppenfertigkeiten und kombiniert ihre Dauer, aber nicht ihre Wirkung. Deine Gruppe erhält die doppelte Anzahl an Punkten, wenn sie eine neue Stufe erreicht. Wirkt, wenn der Gruppenanführer ihn aktiviert hat. (Hält 15 Tage nach der Aktivierung an, auch wenn man abgemeldet ist)
description.fi: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.fil: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.fr: Combine les effets des parchemins d'émulation, de déploiement, de coordination et de fureur. Parchemin à activer par le leader. Augmente l'expérience de groupe de 50%, double les points de groupes obtenus à chaque niveau, permet de lancer les compétences de groupe plusieurs fois pour augmenter leur durée et permet à tous les membres du groupe de bénéficier de leur effets, quelle que soit leur position. (Dure 15 jours à partir de l'activation, même si vous êtes déconnecté)
description.id: Meningkatkan tingkat perolehan Party Exp sebesar 50% dan tingkatkan Party Skill, meniadakan batasan jarak mereka. Memungkinkan Party Skills untuk ditumpuk, menggabungkan durasinya, tetapi tidak berpengaruh. Party Anda akan mendapatkan dua kali lipat jumlah poin saat mencapai level baru. Bekerja ketika pemimpin partai mengaktifkannya. (Berlangsung 15 hari sejak aktivasi, bahkan jika log off)
description.it: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.jp: パーティ経験値の獲得率が50％上昇し、パーティスキルが強化され距離の制限がなくなり（ラージと同じ効果）、パーティスキルを重ね掛けし効果時間を合算することが可能になり、パーティーのレベルアップ時に獲得できるパーティーポイントが2倍になります。パーティリーダーが発動している時に効果を発揮します。(ログアウト時間は減少します。15日間持続）
description.kr: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)

(Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)

Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. description.ru: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.sp: Al activarlo, aumenta la tasa de ganar EXP de Grupo un 50% y mejora la Habilidad de Grupo, sin limitación de distancia. Permite acumular las Habilidades de Grupo combinando su duración, pero no su efecto. El Grupo obtendrá el doble de puntos al conseguir un Nivel nuevo. (Dura 15 días desde la activación, incluso si se desconecta)
description.sw: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50% and enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 15 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.th: เพิ่มอัตราการได้รับ Exp ปาร์ตี้ 50% และเสริมปาร์ตี้สกลิ ลบข้อจำกัดของระยะ อนุญาตให้ใช้ Party Skills ซ้อนกัน รวมระยะเวลา แต่ไม่มีผล ปาร์ตี้ของคุณจะได้รับคะแนนเป็นสองเท่าเมื่อไปถึงเลเวลใหม่ ใช้งานได้เมื่อหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้เปิดใช้งาน (มีอายุ 15 วันนับจากการเปิดใช้งาน แม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้วก็ตาม)
description.tw: 增加劇團經驗獲得率 50% 並增強劇團技能，抵消距離限制。 允許將劇團技能疊加，結合其持續時間，但不疊加效果。 當你的劇團達到一個新的等級時，你的劇團將獲得兩倍的積分。當團長激活它時有效。 （自激活後持續 15 天，即使已離線任然有效）
description.vi: Tăng tỷ lệ nhận được Party Exp lên 50% và nâng cao các Party Skills, loại bỏ các giới hạn về khoảng cách. Cho phép xếp chồng các Party Skills lên nhau , kết hợp thời hạn của chúng, nhưng không có hiệu lực. Nhóm của bạn sẽ nhận được gấp đôi số điểm khi lên cấp độ mới. Hoạt động khi lãnh đạo nhóm đã kích hoạt nó. (Kéo dài 15 ngày kể từ khi kích hoạt, ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất)
